extendedInfo.description: Iowawhitetail is a leading online resource for whitetail deer in Iowa and North America.  The Iowawhitetail app provides easy mobile interaction within our website, forums and community.At Iowawhitetail it is our mission to promote, protect and maintain the integrity of hunting, provide timely and accurate information for hunters and outdoor enthusiasts everywhere while creating an environment that is friendly and educational for all members of our outdoor community.Your obsession with whitetails, mature bucks, conservation and ethics have steered you here.  Our passion for the hunting whitetails, brings us all together no matter the state or country you are from. Contribute, discuss, educate, enjoy, celebrate and learn a little more about one of North America's most elusive big game species.  There is NO comparison, there is only one  Iowawhitetail.IW Mobile Features include:-       Browse your favorite forums in an easy-to-use interface with multiple notification types (Private message, subscription, etc)-       Fully customizable home screen with favorite forums-       Push notifications-       Poll updates from favorites on home screen-       View graphical poll results and vote on forum polls-       Image attachment thumbnail and full size viewing from threads-       View a threads page?s image attachments in one convenient  browser-       Save thread images to your photo library-       Fully searchable forums-       View embedded links without leaving the app, including YouTube videos-       Supports portrait and landscape mode in app-       Full posting options (quote posts, start new reply)-       Attach unlimited photos from your library (or take photo from camera and upload to forum)-       Full support for private messages and private message folders-       Full support for thread subscriptions - track your favorite threads!

reviews.title: Sort of...
reviews.comment: It is a nice app when the pictures show up. Is this only a DROID 3 problem?
reviews.author: James Paup

reviews.comment: The best way to stay updated on all of the latest and greatest from the best place for huge whitetails in the world!
reviews.author: A Google User
